msg: Rename xdocs to xdoc as m2 requires.

author: jbq
msg: * Fix COCOON-1720 (Form.js overwrites the CFormsInstance attribute) by moving
the assignment of viewdata[CFormsInstance] above the sendPage()
* Add the sendForm() function, same as showForm() but without creating a continuation
* Add the sendFormAndWait() function, alias for showForm()
